line.text: 'Cannot send your personal ship to inspection.'

line.comment: * 3.15: Removes recycling options from this menu and implements the detailed inspection feature instead.

line.text: 'A ship with the same template, if any, will be rebuilt after recycling.'
'For fleet ships, it is recommended to use the reinforcement feature, available from the Fleet settings menu.'
'For Workers, Outposts must have the auto-assign setting on if you want the newly built ship to be reassigned.'

line.comment: * $t = columnize menu text: array= $t, text= 'Failures', alignment= -1, colour= 0, column width= $col4
* $t = columnize menu text: array= $t, text= $failures, alignment= -1, colour= 0, column width= $col4

line.text: 'Maintenance cost is increased by maintenance factor.'
'Maintenance factor is increased by 1 at each cycle if the ship is undocked and not equipped with a Mobile Maintenance Kit.'
'No cost for ships which are docked to other ships (but not stations).'
'Maintenance is only paid from your main account.'
'Clicking on a ship will send it to its homebase or to the nearest safe Outpost to get a ship inspection.'
'A ship inspection resets the maintenance factor of the ship to 100%. It's a free process that takes only time.'
'Ships you manually send for inspection will not resume their previous command, if any.'
'Workers are automatically repaired and inspected when needed. Fleet followers have a dedicated fleet setting.'

sval.val: Cannot send your personal ship to inspection.
A ship with the same template, if any, will be rebuilt after recycling.
For fleet ships, it is recommended to use the reinforcement feature, available from the Fleet settings menu.
For Workers, Outposts must have the auto-assign setting on if you want the newly built ship to be reassigned.
Maintenance cost is increased by maintenance factor.
Maintenance factor is increased by 1 at each cycle if the ship is undocked and not equipped with a Mobile Maintenance Kit.
No cost for ships which are docked to other ships (but not stations).
Maintenance is only paid from your main account.
Clicking on a ship will send it to its homebase or to the nearest safe Outpost to get a ship inspection.
A ship inspection resets the maintenance factor of the ship to 100%. It's a free process that takes only time.
Ships you manually send for inspection will not resume their previous command, if any.
Workers are automatically repaired and inspected when needed. Fleet followers have a dedicated fleet setting.
3.15: Removes recycling options from this menu and implements the detailed inspection feature instead.
$t = columnize menu text: array= $t, text= 'Failures', alignment= -1, colour= 0, column width= $col4
$t = columnize menu text: array= $t, text= $failures, alignment= -1, colour= 0, column width= $col4
